Interface Loggable

All Known Implementing Classes:
OfficeCentre
interface Loggable
Provides logging functionality for classes that implement it. Implementing classes must define how messages are written to the file or another logging target

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final String
    logPath
    Default path for the log file

    log(String message)
    Writes a message to the log
